description: This file defines API routes for managing user profiles in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints to create, retrieve, update, delete, and list profiles, utilizing SQLAlchemy sessions and schema validations.

methods.name: create_profile(payload: schemas.ProfileCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new profile for a user based on the provided schema data.

methods.name: get_profile(profile_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a profile by its ID.

methods.name: update_profile(profile_id: int, payload: schemas.ProfileUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Updates fields of a profile identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete_profile(profile_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a profile permanently by its ID.

methods.name: list_profiles( height_category_id: Optional[int] = Query(default=None, description="Height category id"), weight_category_id: Optional[int] = Query(default=None, description="Weight category id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Lists profiles filtered by optional height and weight category IDs.

ctags.name: list_profiles
ctags.signature: ( height_category_id: Optional[int] = Query(default=None, description="Height category id"), weight_category_id: Optional[int] = Query(default=None, description="Weight category id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: update_profile
ctags.pattern: /^def update_profile(profile_id: int, payload: schemas.ProfileUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db/
ctags.signature: (profile_id: int, payload: schemas.ProfileUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
